Text: This needs seeders. I'm willing to seed for quite a while if I get to DL it.

Thanks, excellent torrent, works pretty good.

The only problem is that your installer thingmabob doesn't install the FPS1 codec that FRAPS records in, so I can't view what I've recorded.

Installing the FRAPS demo fixes this, of course, but I can't uninstall it or the codec goes away again, and I'm not sure how this affects my cracked/pirated version.

Oh well, temporary problem until I get my grubby hands on $37 to buy my own license, I guess.

Thanks again!

stop adding ADs to programs setups man..
i don't want to visit any crappy sites
